function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in home delivery services leading to higher interaction between delivery personnel and customers","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases from infected delivery personnel to customers","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for delivery personnel and provide personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Contactless delivery technologies, temperature monitoring devices","People":"Customers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Food service providers"},{"Description":"Difficulty in persuading people to purchase ready-made food due to safety concerns","Impact":"Decreased sales and revenue for food service providers","Mitigation":"Enhance communication of hygienic precautions and safety measures through untact marketing strategies","Technologies":"Social media marketing, video content showing food preparation and packaging","People":"Customers, marketing teams","Owner":"Food service providers"},{"Description":"Increased demand for food and grocery delivery leading to higher exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Health risks for delivery personnel and customers","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for delivery processes and enhance safety measures for online and mobile grocery shopping","Technologies":"Digital payment systems, contactless delivery technologies","People":"Customers, delivery personnel, grocery store staff","Owner":"Grocery stores, food service providers"}]}
